meanings.sent1: The filiform strands of spaghetti were easy to twirl around the fork.
meanings.sent2: The plant had filiform leaves that looked like thin threads.
meanings.sent3: The filiform hair on the doll made it look like a tiny thread factory.
meanings.sent4: The filiform clouds stretched across the sky like delicate threads of cotton.
meanings.sent5: The filiform shape of the wire made it perfect for intricate designs.

meanings.sent1: Her filiform necklace was so delicate and elegant.
meanings.sent2: The spider's web had a filiform appearance, thin and threadlike.
meanings.sent3: The filiform pattern on the dress made it look like a sewing project gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The filiform cracks in the wall looked like tiny threads holding it together.
meanings.sent5: The filiform design on the vase gave it a unique, thread-like texture.

meanings.sent1: The filiform branches of the tree swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The fish had a filiform body, perfect for gliding through the water.
meanings.sent3: The filiform shape of the pencil made it easy to hold and write with.
meanings.sent4: The filiform shadows cast by the streetlights looked like thin lines on the pavement.
meanings.sent5: The filiform structure of the bridge made it look fragile yet strong.
